title: The Ship
notes: Once had purple wall textures, simply restarted and it fixed.

title: The Ship: Murder Party
notes: Fails to run (can be fixed by applying virtual desktop), when you load arcade mode it complains about missing auth module and crashes

it launched in a borderless window in one corner of the screen for several seconds, and then went properly fullscreen. I didn't need to manually turn on virtual desktop. I got an authentication error when trying to load arcade mode, and it made the game crash. When I tried to join a game, it was unable to communicate with the server and wouldn't populate the list. When I tried to host my game, nothing at all seemed to happen.
title: The Ship: Murder Party
